Monica is bemused by what is in her drink

description_info.description: Chandler is at work inputting data into his computer in his work cubicle. Mrs.Tedlock approaches him to inform him of something. Chandler complements Mrs.Tedlock's outfit and on the length of her sleeves. Mrs.Tedlock passes along a meeting request from Mr.Kostelic to Chandler. Chandler is tidying away the prank toys and insists his innocence in regards to the past pranks.
Chandler and Mrs.Tedlock is having a conversation at the office
Mrs.Tedlock lets Chandler know about a meeting request from Mr.Kostelic

qa.question: What kind of animal is Chandler hiding?

qa.answer: To inform him of a meeting request from Mr.Kostelic

description_info.description: Pheobe runs into the café with Joey, Ross, Rachel, Monica all sitting down around the sofa. She talks about a big news regarding Chandler and asks the group to look surprised when Chandler breaks the news. Chandler walks into the café and shares the news about the promotion offer he got from his boss at work. Then the gang congratulates him. Chandler breaks the news that he quit his job since he was unsure whether his job was what he wanted to do in the long run. Pheobe asks Chandler whether he would like to work at her client's restaurant as a head chef. Chandler declines but Monica is willing.
Chandler, Joey, Ross, Rachel, Monica, and Pheobe are at the café sitting around the sofa talking.
Chandler breaks the news in regards to him being offered a promotion at work and the reason why he quit his job to the gang.

qa.question: For how long have Chandler been working at his job?
What is the name of Pheobe's new client?
What is Monica's occupation?

description_info.description: Chandler runs into the apartment kitchen where he is greeted by Rachel. Joey, Ross, and Pheobe are sitting on the sofa in the living room. Chandler tells them about his appointment with a career counselor. Monica runs in excitedly to break the news about the meeting she had with her potential new boss: Steve. She tells the group that she will be inviting Steve to her place for a dinner and suggests Pheobe be there to accompany her. Ross asks the group where he should take Celia for their date night and says that he will bring her back to his apartment to introduce her to his monkey. Joey reckons that Celia will find the monkey very cute.
Monica shares how her meeting went with her new boss.
Ross plans on introducing Celia to his monkey.

qa.question: What is the name of the career counselor?
On which day is Monica cooking dinner for her boss?
What is Celia's job title?

description_info.description: Ross and Celia are at Ross' apartment. Marcel the monkey is hanging on to Celia's hair. Celia is screaming in fear. Ross is trying to calm her down and uses a banana to draw the monkey's attention away from Celia's hair. The monkey hops on to Ross' shoulders.
Marcel the monkey clings on to Celia's hair
Ross panics but manages to get the monkey hop back on to his shoulders.

description_info.description: Monica has cooked a batch of Salmon Mousse. Joey and Rachel are sitting around the kitchen table. Joey tastes a bit of the Salmon Mousse and shares his remarks. Chandler walks into the house with a hand full of test results after his career counseling appointment. Chandler is not pleased with the test results which suggests that he should pursue the same career field that he had just quit from. Monica offers her homemade pre-appetizer to Chandler. Monica talks over the phone with Wendy to discuss the wage for her planned dinner night on Monday. Rachel feels upset that Monica had asked someone else to do the waitressing.
Chandler is talking about the test result he got back from his counselor to Joey, Rachel, and Monica.
Rachel is not impressed by the fact that Monica does not appreciate her waitressing skills.

qa.question: Who is scheduled to come over for waitressing for the Monday night dinner at Monica's?
What fish is used in Monica's Mousse?
What job did the test results indicate for Chandler?
qa.answer: He should pursue a career in Data Processing Management
qa.wrong_answer1: He should pursue a career in sports
qa.wrong_answer2: He should pursue a career in arts
qa.wrong_answer4: He should be a super hero

description_info.description: Celia and Ross are kissing each other at Ross' apartment. Celia insists Ross talk in a nasty manner. Ross, unfamiliar with such action, hesitantly says the word "Vulva".

description_info.description: Ross and Joey are in Joey's apartment kitchen, discussing Ross' last date night. Ross is munching on a bit of bread. They move to the living room with Joey suggesting Ross familiarize dirty talking by saying some to him as a practice. Joey stars off by saying making some dirty comments on Ross. Ross, finally convinced by the idea, engages in the activity by closing his eyes. Suddenly, Chandler comes out of a room to watch. Chandler makes fun of both Ross and Joey. Joey lets Chandler know that Mr.Kostelik has been constantly calling. Another phone call rings and Chandler finally answers it. Chandler's comment over the phone suggests that he is being offered an irresistable offer and decides to go back to work on Monday.
Ross and Joey practice dirty talking to each other.
Chandler decides to go back to his work.

description_info.description: Chandler and Pheobe walk into Chandler's new office. Chandler shows off the view from his office to Pheobe. They both sit on the office chairs. Chandler calls his assistant, 'Helen', without any purpose other than to show off to Pheobe. Helen walks in half-heartedly. Chandler sends Helen away.
Chandler is showing his new office to Pheobe
Chandler calls Helen over to impress Pheobe.

qa.question: What is the name of Chandler's assistant?
What word does Pheobe use to describe Chandler's new office?

description_info.description: Monica is on the phone with Wendy in the kitchen. Monica is angry because Wendy bailed on her. Rachel is getting ready to go out. She is unwilling to help Monica out. Monica proposes to pay her 20 dollars an hour and Rachel finally agrees to help her. Rachel takes her coats off.
Monica receives the news that Wendy won't be able to make it to the dinner over the phone.
After hard negotiation, Rachel agrees to help Monica.

qa.question: Who is Monica on the phone with?
Why was Rachel unwilling to help Monica out?
qa.answer: She was upset because Monica had asked Wendy to help her
qa.wrong_answer1: Because Monica asked her to cook
qa.wrong_answer4: Because she wanted to go out for a walk around

qa.question: How much did Monica agree to pay Rachel per hour?

description_info.description: Steve and Pheobe are greeted by Rachel at the door. Pheobe plays her part by complementing the smell in the kitchen in an exaggerated manner. Monica gives Steve a tour of the house. Meanwhile, Pheobe confesses to Rachel in the kitchen that Steve is high on Marijuana. They gather at the living room. Monica offers her dish for Steve to try. Steve gobbles the food and without listening to Monica's explanation. Steve shows signs of being high on Marijuana by repeatedly saying the same word. He then wanders into the kitchen. Rachel rushes to ask if he needs any help. Rachel signals to Monica that Steve is in an abnormal state. Steve goes through the food in the cabinet but Monica tries her best to get him to wait for the main dish. Steve takes a bag of gummy bears into his jacket and refuses to return it. Steve and Monica both grab hold of the gummy bear packet and eventually, the packet gets ripped apart, splattering all over the dining table. Monica angrily informs Steve that the dinner is over.
Steve and Pheobe are invited over to Monica's house for a dinner and Rachel is the waitress for the night.
Steve's abnormal behavior leads to the dinner ending abruptly.

qa.question: Why was Steve acting strange?
qa.wrong_answer1: Because he didn't want to be at Monica's house
qa.wrong_answer4: Because he was distracted by all the food

qa.question: What was Rachel's role for the dinner?
How many people are involved in the scene?

description_info.description: Ross, Joey, Monica, Rachel, and Pheobe are all sitting around the sofa at the café. The group tries to comfort Monica for what happened on the monday dinner with Steve. Ross goes over to the bar to get some more coffee. Joey follows him to the bar and the two start to talk about Ross' date night with Celia. Ross expresses his confidence in how he finally mastered the art of dirty talk. Pheobe suggests to the group for a late movie night. Rachel suggests waiting for Chandler. Ross wonders where Chandler is.
The whole group except for Chandler are at the café.
The group is chatting about the horrible dinner night with Steve.
